additionalSearchEngineCaution.message: A Search Engine must support https.

indexHTMLCaution.message: Caution: DuckDuckGo does not show a page correctly. It shows a page but there is no scroll bar.

indexHTMLHeading3.message: 3.Choose a Search Engine what you want to use

indexHTMLHeading4.message: 4.You can search with a shortcut key also (the default is Ctrl+Alt+S)

indexHTMLInformation.message: You can manage Search Engine in a manager of extensions (about:addons). If you want to edit the shortcut key, refer to the following site. The default is "Ctrl+Alt+S".
